words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'

H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H1697 prep. k- + n.ms construct davar 'word' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'according to thy word', ESV 'as you say', NASB 'may it be according to your word'
H4616 prep. lemaʿan 'in order that, for the sake of'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H3045 Qal impf. 2ms of יָדַע 'to know'; KJV 'thou mayest know', ESV 'you may know', NASB 'you may know'
H3588 conj. ki 'that, because, for'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H369 particle of negation ʾeyn 'there is not'; KJV 'there is none', ESV 'there is no one', NASB 'there is no one'
H3068 prep. k- + divine name; KJV 'like unto the LORD', ESV 'like the LORD', NASB 'like the LORD'
H430 n.mp construct ʾelohim 'God' + 1cp suff.; KJV 'our God', ESV 'our God', NASB 'our God'
